Name: Rev Up! RC Grand Prix
About the game: This easy-to-master RC car racing game has fun for the whole family! Get behind the wheel of buggies, rally cars, trucks, formula racing cars, motorcycles, and more! There are over 120 varieties of RC vehicles to choose from, and both on-road and off-road courses for you to challenge! Create your own vehicles, and race them around tracks of your own design! You'll have hours of fun racing your way through Grand Prix tournaments and going head-to-head with friends in the multiplayer Party Mode! Single-Player Speed around the track in Free Race Mode, or put your skills to the test in a Grand Prix spanning four different race courses! Multiplayer Compete against up to six players! Challenge your friends and family to a host of fun minigames in Party Mode, or go head-to-head in a Grand Prix tournament! Vehicle Customizer Paint and combine parts to create custom vehicles! Course Creator Design your very own race track, then test it out in Free Race Mode or a Grand Prix! The Shop Use the points you win in-game to purchase new vehicles to race! Collect them all! *Controllers are required for multiplayer play. *Only 4 controllers in XInput format can be connected.
